arts.ttl: Monaco drops points in Champions League race after drawing at Le Havre
arts.sum: Le Havre was in 16th place and the relegation-promotion playoff spot, one point above Saint-Etienne. Monaco moved above Marseille and into second place on goal difference, but direct rivals Nice and Strasbourg both won to move one point behind Monaco with three matches left.

arts.ttl: Le Havre predicted XI v Monaco: Mahamadou Diawara to drop to the bench?
arts.sum: Mahamadou Diawara could drop to the bench as Le Havre AC host AS Monaco. Didier Digard’s side remain in a battle for survival in Ligue 1 with just four games…

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Le Havre: Aleksandr Golovin out, Adi Hütter to rotate?
arts.sum: Aleksandr Golovin is the only major absentee through injury as AS Monaco make the trip to face Le Havre AC on Saturday evening. The Russian is struggling with an adductor…

arts.ttl: Saturday's Ligue 1 predictions including Le Havre vs. Monaco
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Ligue 1 fixtures, including Le Havre vs. Monaco.
